questions.question: The retiring chairman received a …………………… from the new chairman.
questions.description: All of these words can mean praise.

questions.question: Because the old couple was …………………………… they never had to ask for financial help.
The car …………………………. the truck at 70 miles an hour.
questions.description: Passed is the past tense of pass.

questions.question: Did you see a car go …………………………….?
questions.description: Go past means go across one’s field of vision.

questions.question: The difference in their heights is hardly ……………………………….
Should parents be strict or ……………………….?
questions.description: Permissible means permitted. Permissive means lenient.

questions.question: Is this a business call or a …………………………….. one?
questions.description: Personal means belonging to a particular person.

questions.question: All ……………………… will receive an extra week’s vacation.
The …………………………….. were observed by astronomers throughout the world.
questions.description: Phenomena is plural phenomenon is singular.

questions.question: The disease was discovered in an early ……………………………..
Cook the beans with a ……………………………….. of salt pork.
questions.description: Piece means a portion or share.
